official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the
		  Secretary of Veterans Affairs to consider the resources of individuals applying
		  for pension that were recently disposed of by the individuals for less than
		  fair market value when determining the eligibility of such individuals for such
		  pension, and for other purposes.
